teams.name: AirGap

teams.name: Polkahub

teams.name: Avado

teams.name: Aventus

teams.name: Band Protocol

teams.name: Bifrost
teams.description: Bifrost is a Web3 derivatives protocol that provides decentralized cross-chain liquidity for staked assets. Leveraging the cross-consensus message (XCM) can provide cross-chain liquid staking services for multiple chains.

teams.name: Bison Trails
teams.description: Bison Trails is a Validator as a Service provider. It powers critical infrastructure for the world’s leading digital asset exchanges, custodians, funds, and applications.

teams.name: Blockdaemon

teams.name: Bluzelle
teams.description: The Bluzelle project enables dapps to store their data in a place that is both decentralized and mutable.

teams.name: Caelum Labs
teams.description: Caelum Labs is a blockchain development studio focused on identity and privacy solutions. They are focusing on building Decentralised identity modules.

teams.name: Celer Network
teams.description: Celer Network enables fast, easy and secure off-chain transactions for payment transactions and generalized off-chain smart contract.

teams.name: Centrifuge

teams.name: Cere
teams.description: Delivers fast-tracked consumer enterprise adoption through decentralized data clouds, data interoperability and SaaS DeFi.

teams.name: Chainflip Labs

teams.name: ChainSafe

teams.name: ChainX
teams.description: Cross-chain hub for Crypto Asset on Polkadot. Any chain can have asset interoperability with all other chains as long as it establishes a connection with ChainX.
